About Text: My 22+ years of experience spans the entire sales value chain from Managing Retail Stores' P&L, Handling Channel Partners to Driving the Sales Strategy & Improving Margins for Brands. My rich experience and expertise in sales comes from working in diverse industries including Telecom, Retail and Consumer Durables and driving sales through multiple channels like Corporate Sales, DST, Franchisees, Large Format Retail, Distribution Management, E-Commerce and Institutional Channel for Government Department.

Experience Data.company: Philips Domestic Appliances Pvt Ltd- Brand “PREETHI”
Experience Data.title: Head-LFR and E-Commerce
Experience Data.description: Dynamic sales leader responsible for managing sales growth and managing relationships with 27 accounts including National and Regional Retail, Distributor accounts and E-commerce along with Central Police Canteen. Overseeing a business of 300Cr with a team of 22 sales employees and 280+ promoters. Primary responsibility is formulating Terms of Trade /Joint Business Plans with buyers to ensure their growth while protecting Preethi Kitchen appliances Pvt Ltd's margin and delivering exponential business growth. This is achieved through ensuring the right team is in place at all times, allocating the right targets to the team, equipping the team through regular capability building interventions and On the job training, systematically reviewing internally and with the buyers’ teams as well as through effective collaboration with all key stakeholders.
